/**====== 更改密码 ======**/ Old Password： Please input old password New Password： Please input new password Confrim Password： Please enter your new password again Show the password \t\tWMS is a Warehouse Management System (Warehouse Management System), Warehouse Management System is through the warehousing business, outbound business, warehouses, allocating and virtual Warehouse inventory Management, and other functions, the corresponding batch Management, materials, inventory, quality Management, virtual Warehouse inventory Management and just-in-time inventory Management functions such as the integrated use of Management System, effective control and follow up Warehouse logistics and whole process cost Management of the business, implementation or perfect enterprise storage and information Management.The system can carry out inventory operation independently, and can be used in combination with other system documents and vouchers, which can provide enterprises with more complete enterprise logistics management process and financial management information. Process code Work position Line code Work list Product code Injection molding machine Feeding machine Please select the process first and then do this！ Please input / scan the injection molding machine No information on injection molding machine No information on feeding machine No work list information The bar code check is successful and can be submitted！ Scavenging hint At present, the barcode is not identical with the odd number. Is it compulsory to submit?？ Your input / scan injection molding machine does not exist！ /**====== 注塑过站 ======**/ Injection station Please input / scan single number Please enter / scan the serial number of the product The length of the serial number of the product should not be less than 4 No mold information Injection station submission success！ Check success！ Since you have chosen bad products, please select bad code for submission.！ Please enter / select bad code mould quality Good product Rejects product ID Bad code Bad code group Remarks Please enter the note information /**====== CNC ======**/ Please enter / scan the CNC fixture CNC CNC jig Worksheet code Product name Specification model /**====== 抛光 ======**/ Polishing No polishing machine information Polishing equipment 您选择的不良代码已经选中，请重新选择！ 请先配置服务地址 请输入用户名 请输入密码 请输入/生成批次号 请输入/扫描序列号 抽检批号 生成批号 质检名称 质检描述 工序名称 时段代码 时段名称 计划日期 实际样本 合格样本 不合格样本 状态 批通过 批退 外观抽检 当前操作时间不能小于您所选的时间段! 生成批号成功！ 产品序列号校验成功！ 保存检验结果成功！ 您检验项目结果为不良，请选择不良代码！ 请先完成检验项目！ 所有检验项目已完成！ 产品检验 完成
